person:biography.personal-details:content:
Doctoral, Masters and Bachelor’s degrees. Experience and competence in university teaching, curriculum development and administration; research and data analysis and management consultancy services.
Research Interests: Within OB/HRM, my current research paradigm and supervision interest focusses on the following streams: (1) Managing unethical work practices; (2) Employee health, wellbeing and work-life balance; (3) Employee engagement and commitment; and (4) Careers (5) Part-time work and employability.
Expertise and Research Approach: I am a multi-method researcher and have published using both qualitative and quantitative approaches although more strongly aligned with the later.
